title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 535 - Assessment And Review
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 535 - Assessment And Review

State Regulations
§ 535.1 - Notices mailed by the Department of Taxation and Finance
§ 535.2 - Assessment of tax
§ 535.3 - Limitation of assessment
§ 535.4 - Jeopardy assessments
§ 535.5 - Review of assessment issued by the Division of Taxation
§ 535.6 - Repealed

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 535

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §§1138, 1140, 1147

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
